short_summary: Request for Proposal for Valves and Adaptors
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal - Valves and Adaptor

## Government Tender Announcement

The Department of National Defence intends to procure the following items:

### Delivery Details

Deliveries are requested at:

* Canadian Forces Base Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt, British Columbia

### Items to be Procured

The following items are subject to this request for proposal:

* Item 1: DISK, VALVE
	+ GSIN: N4820
	+ NSN: 99-0614264
	+ Part No.: 4A76-W7-057 or 9113417 ITEM 7
	+ Quantity: 30 units
* Item 2: DISK, VALVE
	+ GSIN: N4820
	+ NSN: 99-0614264
	+ Part No.: 4A76-W7-057 or 9113417 ITEM 7
	+ Quantity: 30 units

	+ Quantity: 15 units
